Name: maximize_story_points_per_sprint
Description: Maximize the total number of story points completed in a sprint to increase throughput.

Name: minimize_project_budget_overrun
Description: Ensure the project's total cost does not exceed its allocated budget.

Name: maximize_feature_priority_value
Description: Prioritize the implementation of features with the highest priority value to deliver maximum business value early.

Name: minimize_task_effort
Description: Reduce the total effort (e.g., in hours) required to complete all tasks in a sprint.

Name: maximize_team_velocity
Description: Increase the team's average velocity (story points per sprint) over time.

Name: minimize_active_blockers
Description: Reduce the number of open blockers to ensure a smooth workflow.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_achievement
Description: Ensure the defined sprint goal is achieved by the end of the sprint.

Name: minimize_project_completion_time
Description: Deliver the project as early as possible by minimizing the project end date.

Name: maximize_sprint_goal_benefit
Description: Select sprint goals that provide the highest benefit to stakeholders and the product.

Name: minimize_unresolved_tasks
Description: Minimize the number of tasks that are not in 'done' status at the end of a sprint to avoid spillover.

Name: maximize_test_status_success
Description: Maximize the success rate of tests for each development snapshot to ensure high quality.

Name: maximize_stakeholder_relevance
Description: Focus on features that have a high relevance to key stakeholders.
